description:
The investment seeks capital appreciation by investing in market segments that Active Weighting Advisors LLC (the "Advisor") believes will be impacted by U.S. government policy and regulation.
 The fund is an actively managed exchange-traded fund ("ETF") that seeks to achieve its objective of capital appreciation by investing, including both long and short positions, primarily in equity securities traded in the U.S. markets. Under normal circumstances, it will invest at least 80% of its total assets in the securities of issuers domiciled in the U.S.
